# Ignore Visual Studio files
*.suo
*.user
*.vscode/
*.vssscc
.vs/

# Ignore build output
bin/
obj/

# Ignore NuGet packages
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets
packages/

# Ignore Node.js dependencies (if using)
node_modules/

# Ignore .NET Core artifacts (if using)
*.dll
*.pdb
*.exe

# Ignore database files (if generated)
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Ignore files generated by specific tools
appsettings.Development.json
launchSettings.json

# Ignore user-specific files and settings
*.suo
*.user
*.userprefs
*.lock
